channel.title: Italian Closed Caption - does't work correctly!
channel.description:
Hi!
I found a strange bug in the game: When i selected the Italian Closed Captions, the game should have "all" the translated subtitles in Italian, but instead this does not happen (even for the Inbound "Tram Vox voice and the overhead announcements"; Instead i have only subtitles for dialogues, as if "Subtitles (dialog only)" had selected.)!
here are some examples:
[url]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img923/2503/xmEqnV.jpg[/url] [url]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img922/7906/OnfVxl.jpg[/url] [url]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img924/2234/fYtLIv.jpg[/url]
Can you fix this bug??? Thanks! :smiley:

item.title: Italian Closed Caption - does't work correctly!
item.dc:creator: JakSpoon
item.description:
Any news about this bug??

Read full topic

item.title: Italian Closed Caption - does't work correctly!
item.dc:creator: JakSpoon
item.description:
Hi!

I found a strange bug in the game:
When i selected the Italian Closed Captions, the game should have “all” the translated subtitles in Italian, but instead this does not happen
(even for the Inbound “Tram Vox voice and the overhead announcements”; Instead i have only subtitles for dialogues, as if “Subtitles
(dialog only)” had selected.)!

here are some examples:

https://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img923/2503/xmEqnV.jpg
https://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img922/7906/OnfVxl.jpg
https://imagizer.imageshack.us/a/img924/2234/fYtLIv.jpg

Can you fix this bug???
Thanks!

Read full topic
